oauth2.description:
This API uses OAuth 2 with the Client Credentials flow (defined in OAuth2.0 RFC 6749, section 4.4).
To use this API, you will be supplied with an API Key and Secret by a member of the Codefi team. Keys
and Secrets can be exchanged for Bearer Tokens that identify your requests and authenticate you with the API. 

**Always keep your API Secret secure.**

This documentation should help you get an access token. https://auth0.com/docs/api/authentication#client-credentials-flow
